named-query.name: BC_READ_STRUCTURED_CONTENT_TYPE_BY_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT structuredContentType FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.structure.domain.StructuredContentType structuredContentType WHERE structuredContentType.name = :name

named-query.name: BC_READ_CONTENT_FIELDS_BY_CONTENT_ID
named-query.query: SELECT scField FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.structure.domain.StructuredContentField scField LEFT JOIN FETCH scField.fieldDataList WHERE scField.structuredContent = :structuredContent

named-query.name: BC_ACTIVE_STRUCTURED_CONTENT_BY_TYPE_AND_NAME_AND_PRODUCTION_SANDBOX
named-query.query: SELECT structuredContent FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.structure.domain.StructuredContent structuredContent WHERE structuredContent.sandbox = :sandbox AND structuredContent.structuredContentType = :contentType AND structuredContent.locale = :locale AND structuredContent.contentName = :contentName AND structuredContent.archivedFlag = false AND structuredContent.offlineFlag = false ORDER BY structuredContent.priority

named-query.name: BC_ACTIVE_STRUCTURED_CONTENT_BY_TYPE_AND_NAME_AND_USER_SANDBOX
named-query.query: SELECT structuredContent FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.structure.domain.StructuredContent structuredContent WHERE structuredContent.structuredContentType = :contentType AND structuredContent.locale = :locale AND structuredContent.contentName = :contentName AND structuredContent.archivedFlag = false AND structuredContent.id in (SELECT sandboxItem.temporaryItemId FROM org.broadleafcommerce.openadmin.server.domain.SandBoxItemImpl sandboxItem WHERE (sandboxItem.originalSandBox = :sandbox OR sandboxItem.sandBox = :sandbox) AND sandboxItem.archivedFlag = false AND sandboxItem.temporaryItemId = structuredContent.id) ORDER BY priority

named-query.name: BC_ACTIVE_STRUCTURED_CONTENT_BY_TYPE_AND_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT structuredContent FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.structure.domain.StructuredContent structuredContent WHERE structuredContent.sandbox is null AND structuredContent.structuredContentType = :contentType AND structuredContent.locale = :locale AND structuredContent.contentName = :contentName AND structuredContent.archivedFlag = false AND structuredContent.offlineFlag = false ORDER BY structuredContent.priority

named-query.name: BC_ACTIVE_STRUCTURED_CONTENT_BY_TYPE_AND_PRODUCTION_SANDBOX

named-query.name: BC_ACTIVE_STRUCTURED_CONTENT_BY_TYPE_AND_USER_SANDBOX
named-query.query: SELECT structuredContent FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.structure.domain.StructuredContent structuredContent WHERE structuredContent.structuredContentType = :contentType AND structuredContent.locale = :locale AND structuredContent.archivedFlag = false AND structuredContent.id in (SELECT sandboxItem.temporaryItemId FROM org.broadleafcommerce.openadmin.server.domain.SandBoxItemImpl sandboxItem WHERE (sandboxItem.originalSandBox = :sandbox OR sandboxItem.sandBox = :sandbox) AND sandboxItem.archivedFlag = false AND sandboxItem.temporaryItemId = structuredContent.id) ORDER BY structuredContent.priority

named-query.name: BC_ACTIVE_STRUCTURED_CONTENT_BY_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT structuredContent FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.structure.domain.StructuredContent structuredContent WHERE structuredContent.sandbox is null AND structuredContent.structuredContentType = :contentType AND structuredContent.locale = :locale AND structuredContent.archivedFlag = false AND structuredContent.offlineFlag = false ORDER BY structuredContent.priority
